sentence: We propose a near-eye display optics system that supports three-dimensional mutual occlusion.,,,我们提出了一种支持三维互遮挡的近眼显示光学系统。
We propose the spectrum-tuning method that mitigates the color aberration caused by the phase modulation in OC-OSTHMDs.,,,我们提出了一种频谱调谐方法，以减轻光学中相位调制引起的颜色像差。
The proposed method uses a global modulation to the LCoS pixel array, so it requires minimum computation.,,,该方法是对LCoS像素阵列进行全局调制，因此需要最小的计算量。
Webuild a bench-top prototype of OC-OSTHMDs with multiple phase modulation parts.,,,我们建立了一个带有多相位调制部件的OC-osthmd的台式原型。
Then, the proposed method is validated in three demos, as shown in the figures.,,,然后，在三个演示中验证了所提出的方法，如图所示。
